level.heading: ODOROUS OR OTHER NUISANCE AIR POLLUTANTS (ยง 20-903)

level.text: An emission into the atmosphere of odorous or other air pollutants from any source in any quantity and of any characteristic, and duration which is, or is likely to be injurious to the public health or welfare, or which interferes with the reasonable enjoyment of life and property is prohibited.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Section 3 of the District of Columbia Air Pollution Control Act of 1984, D.C. Law 5-165, 32 DCR 565, 647 (February 1, 1985); as amended by ยง14 of the Solid Waste Facility Permit Act of 1995, D.C. Law 11-94, 42 DCR 7178 (December 29, 1995).
